thread.title: Nowa Brown
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Nowa Brown

author: Nowa Brown
title: Nowa Brown
text: I thought the store would have been mess with ugly furniture.But when i got there everything was in order nicely in order.I would tell everybody go to American freight they are in point.Service is great the layaway is easy and affordable.This will be my one and only furniture store for all my household items:).
